name: Omega Pilot
description:
KNOW THYSELF & LIVE ON THE EDGE!


Become the best - become an Omega Pilot! Do you like first-person racing? If so, then this virtual world is for you.

  • Compete for in-ring races with other pilots in asynchronous multiplayer, which will identify the best among equals.

  • Hone your skills and reach maximum speed. Don't miss the chance to surpass yourself and improve your time on the track. Become the fastest.

  • Stand out not only by the results but also by the unique customization of your "Air Bollid".

  • Enjoy the view from the cockpit and its interior, as you immerse yourself in advanced polygonal graphics.

  • Participate in regular events with prizes, and get ready for constant content updates.

CURRENT FEATURES


  • Try our uniqie immersive virtual game controls



  • Innovative hand control



  • Asynchronous multiplayer mode with different types of tracks



  • Many ship designs for every taste and color! 16 available now, more to come



JOIN THE LEAGUE. BECOME AN OMEGA PILOT!
